definition: to step back
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
old variant of 卻|却[que4]
surname Bu
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
to shrink back/to flinch

sentences.english: The insecurity of the venture kept investors away.
sentences.chinese: 这种冒险事业的不安全性使投资者望而却步。

sentences.english: Charge deaths' God also will flinch. The happy flowers bloom everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 死神也忘而却步，幸福之花处处开遍。

sentences.english: But the high price of it makes a lot of demanders hang back.
sentences.chinese: 然而路由器的高昂价格却令许多需求者望而却步。

sentences.english: Hour-long queues at the tills that snaked around the store were putting many shoppers off.
sentences.chinese: 商店里蜿蜒曲折，近一小时的长队让很多购物者却步。

sentences.english: The unsuitable location of some projects keeps applicants at bay.
sentences.chinese: 一些安居工程也因为位置不当使得申请者望而却步。

sentences.english: Her flat black suede boots and cardigan help make this cooler weather appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 黑色平底的山羊皮长靴和羊毛衫让秋凉望而却步。

sentences.english: Dark energy is a more daunting problem still.
sentences.chinese: 暗能量依旧是一个更加令人却步的问题。

sentences.english: The plainness of these houses discourages many prospective buyers.
sentences.chinese: 这些房子很难看，使许多潜在的买主望而却步。

sentences.english: Thanks to the site's popularity, that has not held developers back.
sentences.chinese: 由于该网站的流行，此举并未能使开发者望而却步。

sentences.english: But, at the same time, high-price of the shops makes ordinary consumers dare not to enter.
sentences.chinese: 但同时，店内高价会另一般的顾客却步。

sentences.english: The cost of the Apple Watch—which starts at $300—puts people off.
sentences.chinese: 苹果手表以300美元开售的价格让很多人望而却步。

sentences.english: Perhaps dieters are seeking out their shunned treats in regular nightly escapes.
sentences.chinese: 或许节食者们都在梦中追求平时望而却步的满汉全席。

sentences.english: Still, should the scab of the sheep cause the shepherd to recoil?
sentences.chinese: 可是羔羊的癣疥应当使牧人却步吗？

sentences.english: The lack of hard science is enough to scare off my friend.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏自然科学常识足以使我的朋友望而却步了。

sentences.english: Shark Tale is a cartoon, but don't let that scare you.
sentences.chinese: 《鲨鱼黑帮》是部卡通影片，但你不要望而却步。

sentences.english: I have heard that some social groups to help AIDS orphans is on the back.
sentences.chinese: 有些社会团体一听到帮助的是艾滋病人遗孤就却步了。

definition: to shrink back/to flinch
to feel intimidated
intimidate at the first glance (idiom); awe-inspiring/terrifying/overwhelming
to stand still without advancing (idiom); to hesitate and hold back
to hesitate to move forward/to hesitate/to hold back
hesitant to take action
too high to reach (idiom); eminent and unapproachable
in sight but unattainable (idiom)/inaccessible
pinyin: ke3 wang4 er2 bu4 ke3 ji2

definition: to hesitate/indecisive
lit. to gaze at the ocean and lament one's inadequacy (idiom)/fig. to feel powerless and incompetent (to perform a task)
in sight but unattainable (idiom)/inaccessible/also written 可望而不可及[ke3 wang4 er2 bu4 ke3 ji2]
pinyin: ke3 wang4 er2 bu4 ke3 ji2

definition: lit. to see only the other rider's dust and have no hope of catching up (idiom)/to be far inferior
lit. to beat the return drum (idiom)/fig. to give up/to turn tail
lit. to retreat three day's march (idiom); fig. to give way in the face of superior strength/a strategic withdrawal
hesitancy/indecision/to waver
to tremble with fear (idiom)/scared witless
